title: About me
body:
Introduction to Angular

Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript. Angular is written in TypeScript, a superset of JavaScript that adds optional static typing and class-based object-oriented programming.

Key Features

  • Component-based architecture
  • Powerful templating system
  • Dependency injection
  • Comprehensive routing

This blog will help you understand the basics of Angular development.
